description: This file initializes and configures a vector database (LanceDB) and a knowledge base for processing PDF URLs, then creates an agent to interact with the knowledge base and perform a query.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base and performs responses.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads or reloads the knowledge base data.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response to a query.
